thread.title: Dare to take a walk on the wild side
thread.title_full: Dare to take a walk on the wild side

author: eTN Editor
title: Dare to take a walk on the wild side
text:
Dare to take a walk on the wild side Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
By Andrew J. Wood, eTN Thailand Correspondent | Sep 11, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
BANGKOK, Thailand - The South African Ball is the premier charity event held by the South African Thai Chamber of Commerce and Jabulani - the chamber’s social network. 
Following on from the successes of previous events, this year promises to be one of the best yet. Themed “Take a walk on the Wild Side,” the inspiration is derived from the diverse environments encompassed in both South African wildlife and the vibrancy of its cities. Africa has her own magical rhythm, and the chamber is bringing this to Bangkok for all to enjoy. 
Guest will be entertained by the beat of African drums and the calls of her wild side and the varied flavors hidden in Africa's famous wines and traditional foods. 
A number of prizes and silent auctions will be on offer along with a door prize of 2 return tickets on Kenya Airways from Bangkok to Johannesburg. Exclusive prints and an original from acclaimed South African artist, Sena, will be available under auction. 
The event will be hosted at the Sofitel Bangkok, Sukumvit, on September 12, 2015. Tickets can be purchased from the SATCC by emailing emailing Khun Kuruvin . 
Included in the ticket price is a gourmet meal, free flow wine, beer, soft drinks, door prize, live musical act from South Africa and so much more. 
Proceeds of the event are donated to two charities - The Rice Seeds Child Sponsorship Program (in Thailand) and The Rhino Orphanage (in South Africa). 
This only happens every two years and promises to be a South African night to remember! Dare to TAKE A WALK ON THE WILD SIDE...
